CustomField.description: Total value of all the billing document line items on this billing document based on the Document Type. If the document is an invoice, the value is the same as the Document Total. If the document is a credit note, the value is calculated using the formula: Document Total * -1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total value of all the billing document line items on this billing document based on the Document Type.
CustomField.label: Reporting Document Total
